    x = sorted(list_of_countries),
    y = freq_countries,
    mode = "lines+markers" ,
    hoverinfo = 'y',
)]

    margin = dict(
    b=130
    ))
fig_countries = go.Figure(data=barplot_countries, layout=layout)
